name: market group for heat, central or small-scale, biomethane | heat, central or small-scale, biomethane | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23113/documentation

This dataset is a market group. Market groups represent a 'market of markets'. Their purpose is to group a set of markets into larger, geographically relevant datasets.;Market groups are created for convenience and ease of use. They only group other markets and/or market groups contained within their geography.;This market delivers heat from a production plant in a global geography to a consuming activity in the same geography. No losses and no transportation are considered for this product.;This is the market group for 'heat, central or small-scale, biomethane', in the Global geography.

This activity starts at the gate of markets that deliver 'heat, central or small-scale, biomethane', in geographies contained within the geography of this dataset.

This activity ends with the supply of 'heat, central or small-scale, biomethane',  to the consumers of this product within the geography of Global.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/353:Steam and air conditioning supply/3530:Steam and air conditioning supply

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The composition is based on the relative production volumes represented by the inputs (markets and market groups). Any extrapolation in these inputs therefore affects this dataset.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Represents all markets contained in the geography of the dataset.
